resources.string: Helps you keep streaks. Only works if you have friends.
Fei Kuan on Android Studio, running on KDE neon and Manjaro.
The past is in the past.
How many hours ago? If around half an hour, select 0.
Send streaks now. Losing Streak in %1$d hours.
Please use the button below and menu above to get started.
Too long ago! Send a snap now!
You will be reminded every %1$d hours for streaks, until you sent a streak or if you lost them.
You will be reminded for streaks every %1$d hours.
Reminder Disabled. Send a streak and use the menu below to enable.
Please set a reminder interval using the menu above.
Reminder not on. Reminder interval is set to %1$d hours.
You missed a notification! Losing Streak in %1$d hours!
You already missed %1$d notifications! Losing Streak in %2$d hours.
Don\'t forget to send streaks! Losing streaks in %1$d hours.
You are about to lose your streaks!!!!! Send streaks now!!!!
You may have lost your streaks. Send it immediately or stop the reminder in the app.
Disable reminder or set how often to be reminded here. The default is 8 hours.
Press this button after you sent every streaks. You can also do it in notifications that pop up.
You may have lost your streaks. Please send it immediately.

This application is made available under the GNU General Public License Version 3 or later. You are free to redistribute and/or modify it under this license. Click to visit my GitHub page for source code and license details.
Your device prevents Streak Alarm from reminding you of streaks accurately. Please go to Settings to disable battery optimization by whitelisting this app.
